Pre-Game Insights: The Knicks are 2-1 against division opponents and rank sixth in the Eastern Conference at limiting opponent scoring.
The Nets are 0-3 against the rest of their division and rank seventh in the Eastern Conference shooting 37.0% from 3-point range.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks score 115.7 points per game, 1.0 more point than the 114.7 the Nets give up.
Karl-Anthony Towns is averaging 26.5 points and 12.2 rebounds for the Knicks.
Cameron Thomas is scoring 25.3 points per game and averaging 3.2 rebounds for the Nets.
Others: The Knicks have a strong defensive record, while the Nets rely on three-point shooting.
Both teams have key players with significant performances expected.
